column5: Early this year I got pretty tired of paying 4 bucks for 2 teardrops from the local trading post so I decided to start looking online. Needless to say I found a great site.  If anyone is looking for some high quality, great priced jigs, this is the place. Ordered from them twice already this year, shipping was cheap ($2.00), and I have to say, they do sell a nice product.  You have to check them out. http://www.jamminjigs.com/
